headline: Goldman’s stock surges to another record, as the ‘big winner’ of Fed’s stress tests
summary: Goldman’s stock surges to another record, as the ‘big winner’ of Fed’s stress tests

headline: Goldman Sachs And These Banks Just Aced The Fed's Stress Test: Analyst
summary: Goldman Sachs led the Dow Jones Industrial Average higher on Monday morning after it cleared the Federal Reserve's stress test with flying colors.  Analysts also placed Wells Fargo and M&T Bank among the biggest winners of the Fed's annual test, which determines how well a bank's capital buffers can survive a crisis.  The Fed's clearance for the banks to lower their capital reserves should free up space for additional lending, dividends, stock buybacks and possibly acquisitions.

raw.headline: Goldman Sachs And These Banks Just Aced The Fed's Stress Test: Analyst
raw.summary: Goldman Sachs led the Dow Jones Industrial Average higher on Monday morning after it cleared the Federal Reserve's stress test with flying colors.  Analysts also placed Wells Fargo and M&T Bank among the biggest winners of the Fed's annual test, which determines how well a bank's capital buffers can survive a crisis.  The Fed's clearance for the banks to lower their capital reserves should free up space for additional lending, dividends, stock buybacks and possibly acquisitions.

headline: What’s Next for Goldman Sachs and Other Banks After Acing Fed's Stress Test
summary: All 22 banks in this year’s stress test had enough capital to absorb more than $550 billion in losses during a severe downturn, and still continue lending, the Fed said late Friday.  Under the Fed's hypothetical recession scenario, banks’ common equity Tier 1 capital ratio—a key measure of balance-sheet strength which calculates capital against assets—declined 1.8 percentage points.  Goldman Sachs is set to see the largest easing of capital requirements, said Barclays analysts.

headline: U.S. bank stocks rise after Fed stress test results
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. bank stocks moved higher Monday following the release of the Federal Reserve’s annual stress test results, which Wells Fargo analysts said marked a turning point toward “less onerous, less volatile, and more transparent” regulation.

headline: What to Expect From M&T Bank's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: M&T Bank will release its second-quarter earnings next month, and analysts anticipate a single-digit bottom-line growth.
